                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কিডনি নিঃসৃত এরিথ্রোপয়েটিন হরমোনটি RBC তৈরি নিয়ন্ত্রণ করে।<br>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>+</mo><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-34" style="width: 2.42em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-35"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-36" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-37"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-38" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-39"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-40"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>+</mo><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\rm Ca^{++}</script></span> আয়ন থ্রম্বোপ্লাস্টিন উৎপাদনে সাহায্য করে এবং Prothrombin কে Thrombin এ পরিণত করে।<br>
[গাজী আজমল স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৮৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: BNP Test দ্বারা Heart failure নিশ্চিত হওয়া যায়।<br>
[গাজী আজমল স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২১৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 27 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কৃত্রিম পেসমেকারের ব্যাটারি কোন ধাতু দিয়ে তৈরি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: যান্ত্রিক পেসমেকারে অপরিবাহী আবরণযুক্ত ১-৩টি তার থাকে।<br>
[গাজী আজমল স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২১৭]</p>

                                            <span>Question 31 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পর্যায় সারণিতে s-ব্লক মৌলের সংখ্যা কতটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>14</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>36</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>27</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>41</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: p-ব্লক মৌলের সংখ্যা 36 টি;<br>
d-ব্লক মৌলের সংখ্যা Th (90) সহ 41 টি;<br>
f-ব্লক মৌলের সংখ্যা 27 টি।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৫৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

</label>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: Og → p-ব্লক মৌল; Lr, Lu → f-ব্লক মৌল।<br>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: N এর দুটি অক্সাইড <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.56em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-108"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-109"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-111" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\rm N_2O</script></span>&nbsp;এবং NO গ্যাস নিরপেক্ষ; N এর অপর অক্সাইডসমূহ অম্লধর্মী।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 39 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি শ্বাসরোধকারী গ্যাস?</p>

                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: নিকটোজেন বা শ্বাসরোধকারী গ্যাস - <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ২য় শক্তিস্তরে 2d অরবিটাল না থাকার কারণে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>5</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="width: 2.174em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.76em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-195"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-198"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>5</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm NCl_5</script></span>&nbsp;গঠিত হয় না।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        </div>

                                            </div>

</label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ফ্লোরিন ফিকে হলুদ গ্যাস; ক্লোরিন সবুজাভ হলুদ গ্যাস; আয়োডিন গাঢ় বেগুনি বর্ণের কঠিন পদার্থ।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭৬]</p>
</span>

[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৮৩]</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 43 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-222" style="width: 2.573em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-231" style="width: 1.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1001.39em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-232"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-233"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-235"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-236"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-237" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-238" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm V^{4+}</script></span> আয়নের বর্ণ নীল;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-239" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.01em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-240"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-241"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm {\rm Mn}^{3+}</script></span> আয়নের বর্ণ বেগুনি;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-250" style="width: 2.461em; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৮৪]</p>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-297"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.004em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-299" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.392em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">\rm sp^3d^3 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 46 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটির পারমাণবিক আকার ছোট?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Si</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Na</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>K</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Rb</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পারমাণবিক আকার → বাম থেকে ডানে → কমে<br>
পারমাণবিক আকার → উপর থেকে নিচে → বাড়ে<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৯৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                            <span>Question 49 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>7</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-327" style="width: 3.206em;                                 <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>7</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-367" style="width: 10.822em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-373"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-383" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-386"><span style="display: inline-block; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩১৩]</p>
</span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটিতে বিজোড় ইলেকট্রন সংখ্যা সর্বাধিক?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>24</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mn>5</mn></msup><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>1</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-389" style="width: 7.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.109em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1006.11em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-390"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-393" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">24</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-399"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-403"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>24</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mn>5</mn></msup><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>1</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\rm Cr\left(24\right)\rightarrow3d^54s^1</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৮২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1001.8em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-439"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-441"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-443"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-444"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-445" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৮৪]</p>

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি পানির সাথে বিক্রিয়া করে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-447" style="width: 1.455em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.19em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-448"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-449"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">\rm O_2</script></span> উৎপন্ন করতে সক্ষম?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭৭]</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-499" style="width: 1.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.559em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.56em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-500"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-501" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-502"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-503" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">\rm CO_2</script></span> অধাতুর অক্সাইড। অধাতুর অক্সাইড অম্লধর্মী।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩১২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 56 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুটি অশূন্য সমান ভেক্টর থেকে শূন্য ভেক্টর পেতে হলে এদের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ হবে-</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২৭]</p>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.55em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.447em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\frac{\pi}{4} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

-9.848em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 11.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\rm \vec{A}\times\vec{B}=\vec{B}\times\vec{A}&nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow\vec{A}\times\vec{B}=-\left(\vec{A}\times\vec{B}\right)&nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow2\left(\vec{A}\times\vec{B}\right)=0&nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow2 \ ABsin\theta=0&nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow sin\theta=0&nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow\theta=\pi&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-692" style="width: 8.336em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-693"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-694"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-695"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-696"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.731em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.144em, 1000.73em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.324em; left: 0.139em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.458em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 60 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>m এর মান কত হলে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-776" style="width: 9.167em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.491em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.12em, 1007.49em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-777"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-778"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-779"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-780"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.747em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; -3.748em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">\rm \bar{A}.\bar{B}=\left(2\hat{i}+2\hat{j}-2\hat{k}\right).\ (m\hat{i}+3\hat{j}+4\hat{k})=0&nbsp;\\ \Rightarrow2m+6-8=0&nbsp;\\ \Rightarrow2m-2=0\therefore\ m=1&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৫]</p>
</span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 61 </span>

                                            </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 69 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বাঁক নেওয়ার সময় সাইকেলসহ আরোহীর নতি কোণ হবে-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1001.14em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 3.235em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.831em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>ω</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-101">\rm \theta=\tan^{-1}{\left(\frac{\omega r^2}{g}\right)} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৯৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <span>Question 70 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>লিফ্&zwnj;টে&nbsp;দণ্ডায়মান একজন ব্যক্তির অতিভারহীনতা পরিলক্ষিত হয় যখন লিফটের ত্বরণ a-</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1171" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.325em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.551em, 1002.33em, 2.598em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1172"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1173" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1174" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">&gt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1175" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-108">\rm a>g&nbsp;</script></span></p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 73 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>16 N এর একটি বল 4 kg ভরের উপর 4 s ক্রিয়া করে। বস্তুটির বলের ঘাত কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>64</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1216" style="width: 11.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.756em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1009.72em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1217"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1220" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1221" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1225" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1228" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">64</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1231" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>64</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-114">\rm J=F\times t=16\times4=64\ Ns&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৫০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 76 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>What parts of speech is the word ‘Extraordinary’?<b> </b></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Noun</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Verb</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Adjective</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Adverb<b> </b></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Extraordinary শব্দটির adverb হলো extraordinarily.</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 77 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>What is the noun form of the word 'Forget'? <b>&nbsp;</b></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Forgetfulness</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Forgetful</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Forgetfully</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Forgotten<b> </b></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>এই শব্দটিকে আগে adjective এর রূপান্তর করে তার noun করতে হয়।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 78 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>Mutton is a/an -</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Common noun</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                    </div>

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Proper noun</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Material noun হলো পদার্থ বা Raw materials তাই এক্ষেত্রে Mutton material noun।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
