                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>5</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-565" style="width: 2.78em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.76em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-583"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-586" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\rm MgO </script></span>&nbsp;ক্ষারধর্মী অক্সাইড।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩১২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>90</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-618" style="width: 1.869em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.505em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.37em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-619"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">90</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-621"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-622"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-623" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>90</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">90° </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-624" style="width: 1.869em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.505em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.37em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-625"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-626" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">45</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-627"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-628"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-629" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-74">45° </script></span></p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-636" style="width: 1.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.004em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1000.87em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-637"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-638" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-639"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-640"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-641" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-76">0° </script></span></p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>.</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>|</mo></mrow><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>|</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1009.06em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -2.621em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-665" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-666" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-667" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-668" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-669" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-672" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-676" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-678" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-679" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1004.88em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -1.432em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1006.76em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -0.121em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-690" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-692" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.27em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cot</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-694"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-695"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-696" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-697" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-698"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-699" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-700"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-701" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-703" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1004.47em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: 1.273em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-706" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-708" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">45</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-709"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-710"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 7.666em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -6.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 8.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>.</mo><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>×</mo><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\rm \overrightarrow A. \overrightarrow B=|\overrightarrow A \times \overrightarrow B| &nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow ABcos\theta=ABsin\theta&nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow cot\theta=1&nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow\theta=\cot^{-1}{(1)}&nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow\theta=45°&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 60 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ভেক্টর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-760" style="width: 9.465em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.751em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.784em, 1007.75em, 2.573em, -999.998em);                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-831" style="width: 11.355em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.305em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1009.3em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-832"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-833"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-834" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-835" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-836" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-837" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-838"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-839" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-840" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-841" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-842" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-843" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-844" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-845"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-846" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-847" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-848" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-849" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-852"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-853" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-854" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-89">\frac{a}{9}=\frac{-3}{6}=\frac{5}{-10}\Rightarrow a=-\frac{9}{2} </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 61 </span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-893" style="width: 15.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.666em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1012.46em, 3.568em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-951" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mo>∵</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-95">\rm \hat{k}.\left(\hat{k}\times\hat{i}\right)=\hat{k}.\hat{j}=0 \ \left[\because\hat{k}\times\hat{i}=\hat{j}\right]</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                            <span>Question 65 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সবল নিউক্লীয় বলের পাল্লা কত?</p>

                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৪২]</p>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 66 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পৃথিবীর ক্ষেত্রে, রকেটের সাহায্যে অর্জিত মুক্তি বেগ-</p>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একক কৌণিক বেগে ঘূর্ণনরত বস্তুর জড়তার ভ্রামক এর গতিশক্তির-</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1088" style="width: 16.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.814em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(4.018em, 1013.73em, 8.281em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1126" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1004.14em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -0.9em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1128" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">I</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1132" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1133" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 5.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.897em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mo>∵</mo><mi>ω</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-108">\rm E=\frac{1}{2}I\omega^2&nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow E=\frac{1}{2}I\times1^2\ [\because\omega=1\ rads^{-1}]&nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow I=2E&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৮০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 69 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সাইকেল আরোহীর বাঁক নেয়ার সময় আরোহীর বেগ কোনটি?</p>

width: 2.826em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.005em; left: -0.089em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.005em; left: 2.143em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.005em;                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৯৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 70 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>m ভর ও r&nbsp;ব্যাসার্ধের বৃত্তাকার চাকতির যেকোনো ব্যাসের সাপেক্ষে জড়তার ভ্রামকের মান কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩১৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 71 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি লিফট a ত্বরণে নিচে নামছে। m&nbsp;ভরের একজন ব্যক্তি লিফটের মেঝেতে কত বল প্রয়োগ করবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 72 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>রৈখিক বেগ ও কৌণিক বেগের মধ্যে সম্পর্ক কোনটি?</p>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.96em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.551em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1271" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1273" style="padding-left: 0.276em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.004em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.463em, 1000.5em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0.23em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.96em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.551em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1275" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1276" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">×</span><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1277" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.004em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.37em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0.321em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1278" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.96em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.551em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1279" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.447em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mover><mi>ω</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>×</mo><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-123">\rm \overrightarrow \omega=\overrightarrow v \times \overrightarrow r </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mover><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1280" style="width: 6.787em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-129-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1.015</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1341" style="width: 7.015em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-131-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>}</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0.015</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1367" style="width: 27.01em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 22.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1022.13em, 5.822em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1368"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 22.133em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1006.19em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1369" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1372"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1374" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1022.13em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -2.58em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1378" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.05</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">{</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1383" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1385" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1387"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">}</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1393" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.05</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.015</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1399" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1402"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1404"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1405"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1406" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1407" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo fence="false" stretchy="false">{</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo fence="false" stretchy="false">}</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0.015</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-131">\rm J=mv_0-mv \\ =0.05 \ \{0.2-\left(-0.1\right)\}=0.05\times0.3=0.015\ kgms^{-1}</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৫১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1424" style="width: 3.19em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.598em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.277em, 1002.6em, 2.37em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.731em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1429"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1430"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1431" style="font-size: 70.7%; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-135-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1433" style="width: 2.871em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>রৈখিক ভরবেগের নিত্যতা সূত্র</p>

                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কৌণিক ভরবেগের নিত্যতা সূত্র</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৬২]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 76 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>Are you an early riser? Here ‘early’ is:</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Verb</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Adverb</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Noun</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Adjective</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p style="text-align: justify;">ly যুক্ত শব্দ সর্বদা Adverb হয় না। মনে রাখতে হবে: Noun + ly = Adjective; Adjective + ly = Adverb; early শব্দটি এখানে 'riser' noun এর আগে বসে তাকে modify করেছে বলে এটি Adjective.</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 77 </span>
                                        </div>
